pages.text: Tetra introduces a modular tool and weapon system to Minecraft. $(br2)Customize your gear by crafting modular tools with unique abilities and upgrading them as you progress.

Start by crafting a Modular Workbench, then use it to modify your tools and weapons. $(br2)Combine different materials like wood, iron, and diamonds to create a variety of tool heads, bindings, and handles.

Upgrade your modular gear with new abilities and stats, like increased durability or faster mining speed. $(br2)Unlock additional crafting options by exploring underground structures or researching ancient technology.
Tetra provides endless customization possibilities for your tools and weapons. $(br2)Explore the modular system, find the perfect combination, and create the ultimate gear set!
